Summary: traveling glowing across entire sky from south to north
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Dana Point
There were no other sightings in Dana Point on or around February 26th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a glowing object in the sky, The object flew from south to north. I could not tell what altitude it was at but it appeared to travel the entire sky in about 6 seconds. It was faintly lit and did not look like a falling star or an airplane. It seemed to slow for a falling star and to fast for an airplane. It seemed to be a light orange redish color. Strange Indeed.
